entities.description: Circumstances under which a justifiable homicide occurred.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a police officer, resulting in the officer killing the criminal.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a fellow police officer, resulting in the criminal being killed by another police officer.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a civilian.
Circumstance where a criminal attempted to flee from a crime scene.
Circumstance where a criminal was killed during the commission of a crime.
Circumstance where a criminal resisted arrest and was killed.
The survey collecting information on justifiable homicide circumstances.
The unweighted frequency of each justifiable homicide circumstance.

relationships.description: Indicates the circumstance where a criminal attacked a police officer and was killed.
Indicates the circumstance where a criminal attacked a fellow police officer and was killed by another officer.
Indicates the circumstance where a criminal attacked a civilian.
Indicates the circumstance where a criminal attempted to flee from a crime.
Indicates the circumstance where a criminal was killed during the commission of a crime.
Indicates the circumstance where a criminal resisted arrest and was killed.
Reports the unweighted frequency of occurrences for each justifiable homicide circumstance.
